channel.title: LS Connect to SQL Error
channel.description:
When I try to connect to my hostgator server, i get this error.
[IMG]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/747/screenshot20130131at510.png[/img]
My LS settings. (ive deleted the password just for this picture)
[IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/4816/screenshot20130131at512.png[/img]
Another thing to note: It works fine on a local connection, and my hostgator server is working (i can connect to it via other ways)

item.title: LS Connect to SQL Error
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

[quote=“Ecko, post:4, topic:481011”]There is no wifebeater_rscangel database. I am only seeing:
_antispam
_unlimited
_wiki

All those have the cPanel username: snemosdn[/quote]

yeah im connecting with snemo, but that name has a bad rep so im not using it on the picture lol

Read full topic

item.title: LS Connect to SQL Error
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

CodeForFame:

You’re using the wrong character set in the DB…

The charset is set to utf8. Same as my local database… Is that not correct? And why is it erroring if its the same.

Read full topic
